function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of automation, machine learning, and artificial intelligence in customer service","Impact":"Job displacement, changing shopping behaviors, and altered service landscape","Mitigation":"Reskilling and retraining the workforce, implementing ethical guidelines for AI and automation use, and providing support for affected industries","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, automation, robotics, and chatbots","People":"Employees in service industries, consumers, and workers in production and retail sectors","Owner":"Government, businesses, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Reliance on global production plants and suppliers, leading to vulnerability during lockdowns and social distancing measures","Impact":"Disruption of supply chains and operations, dependence on other countries for essential goods and services","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, boosting local production, and implementing contingency plans for emergencies","Technologies":"Supply chain management technology, production automation, and data analytics","People":"Businesses, governments, and consumers","Owner":"Businesses, government agencies, and industry organizations"}]}
